javafxapplicationud3example.rest

Class UserRESTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafxapplicationud3example.rest.UserRESTClient

  • public class UserRESTClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Jersey REST client generated for REST resource:UserREST [user]. It contains methods needed to invoke a user RESTful web service residing in a Glassfish Server.
    USAGE: 
            UserRESTClient client = new UserRESTClient();
        Object response = client.XXX(...);
        // do whatever with response
        client.close();

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserRESTClient

        public UserRESTClient()
        Construct a UserRESTClient. It creates a RESTful web client and establishes the path of the WebTarget object associated to the client.

      • find_XML

        public <T> T find_XML(java.lang.Class<T> responseType,
                      java.lang.String id)
               throws javax.ws.rs.ClientErrorException
        Get a user's entity XML representation from the user RESTful web service and return it as a generic type object.
        Parameters:
        responseType - The Class object of the returning instance.
        id - The id of the instance in the server side.
        Returns:
        The object containing the data.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.ClientErrorException - If there is an error while processing. The error is wrapped in a HTTP error response.
